table_definition.name: pagefact_by_
table_definition.comment: Open OnDemand page impression facts aggregated by ${AGGREGATION_UNIT}.

columns.name: ${AGGREGATION_UNIT}_id
columns.comment: DIMENSION: The id related to modw.${AGGREGATION_UNIT}s.

columns.name: record_resource_id
columns.comment: DIMENSION: The resource running Open OnDemand.

columns.name: resource_organization_id
columns.comment: DIMENSION: The organization of the resource running Open OnDemand.

columns.name: person_id
columns.comment: DIMENSION: The person who was logged in to Open OnDemand.

columns.name: user_id
columns.comment: DIMENSION: The system account (local username) of the person who was logged in to Open OnDemand.

columns.name: app_id
columns.comment: DIMENSION: The Open OnDemand app that was accessed. Inferred from the request line path.

columns.name: location_id
columns.comment: DIMENSION: The location of the web client that accessed Open OnDemand. Inferred from the IP address.

columns.name: ua_family_id
columns.comment: DIMENSION: The user agent that accessed Open OnDemand. Inferred from the UA string.

columns.name: ua_os_family_id
columns.comment: DIMENSION: The operating system that accessed Open OnDemand. Inferred from the UA string.

columns.name: impression_count
columns.comment: FACT: The total number of page impressions in which a person accessed an Open OnDemand app.

columns.name: session_count
columns.comment: FACT: The total number of sessions, where a session is a unique grouping of page impressions by person, app, day, resource, operating system, and browser.
